title: Augusta County: William B. Gallaher to E.C. Gallaher, May 23, 1861
summary: William B. Gallaher describes an accident in camp, mentions a visit to his grandfather's home, and requests a box of provisions.
keywords: This letter was transcribed from another transcribed copy. William B. Gallaher's mother's name was taken from the census. The text of the letter mentions that William B. Gallaher would write to "Hugh" on the back of the page, but the transcriber did not include the letter (or Gallaher did not write to Hugh).
